title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or embeddings with standard LangChain callbacks.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama supporting multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, and user management.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting, managing models, and benchmarking Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot replacement with inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin library for Ollama providing synchronous & asynchronous APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama discord bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and model auto-pull.

title: ollama-express
summary: Lightweight Express.js REST proxy that adds JWT auth, rate limiting, and usage logs atop Ollama.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 instances with Ollama and common models pre-installed.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with serde models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that supports multi-model conversations, markdown, and LaTeX rendering via Ollama.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama with context support, streaming, and automatic model pulling.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with cross-compilation support and minimal dependencies.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models via REST with admin UI and API-key throttling.
